ðŸ“– Summary: Local Dream is an Android application that allows users to run Stable Diffusion models on their devices. It supports Snapdragon NPU acceleration for faster inference, as well as CPU/GPU inference. The application provides features like text-to-image generation, image-to-image transformation, and inpainting.
